songs.title: Anarchy yacht
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
(Lil Boat) Stay with the Mac like Apple
Talking that shit, have them call me El Chapo (Ooh)
Young nigga fly, I can fly, pterodactyl
Got a new bitch with a son, he a rascal
I get the bag from the city to the capital
These niggas fake and Lil Boat be the actual (Ooh)
Beefing online, but in person you rational (Yeah, ooh, yeah)
I do not get it
Making this money, it's making them livid
The shit that you rap 'bout, you know you don't live it
I got the coupe with the top, you can lift it
I got the coupe with the engine, go drift it (Ooh)
Diamonds they wet like a cup of the mystic (Yeah)
Living this life, so futuristic
Stay optimistic (Yeah)

[Hook]
Anarchy, anarchy
My life it look like your fantasy
You can't imagine my salary (Yeah)
Counting my money like calories (K)
Women they all coming after me (K)
Call me a friar, like gasoline
I'm on the track, it's a masterpiece (Yeah)
I steal your girl, that's a tragedy (Lil Boat)
All of these dudes, they mad at me (Mad)
I keep on balling like 23 (Swish)
No one can stop me it's anarchy (Yeah)
Anarchy, anarchy, anarchy (Gang)
Aye, ooh, (Aight) no one can stop me it's anarchy
Anarchy, anarchy, anarchy
No one can stop me it's anarchy (Let's go)

[Verse 2]
Off the top of the dome
I'm a big boss, Al Capone
Rocking [?] like my name was Jerome
He want the smoke, told the boy to come on
All of the gang members, what's up and I'm on (Yeah)
Fuck with the set, look at my phone (Fuck)
I do not club, that's not what I do
I stay at home and sleep in the stu'
Plotting on ways to build up revenue
Catch me outside on the old avenue
Been a star player, check the attributes
Ben 'bout the guap since I had sessions too
I know they want the boy hung by a noose
Won't catch me lacking, I stay with the truth
Shoot night roofs, and a light handed loops (Pa)
Shoot, shoot, shoot

[Hook]
Yeah, anarchy, anarchy
My life it look like your fantasy
You can't imagine my salary (Yeah)
Counting my money like calories (K)
Women they all coming after me (K)
Call me a friar like gasoline
I'm on the track it's a masterpiece (Yeah)
I steal your girl that's a tragedy (Lil Boat)
All of these dudes they mad at me (Mad)
I keep on balling like 23 (Swish)
No one can stop me, it's anarchy (Yeah)
Anarchy, anarchy, anarchy (Gang)
Aye, ooh, (Aight) no one can stop me, it's anarchy
Anarchy, anarchy, anarchy
No one can stop me it's anarchy (Ooh)
